hero.title: Enterprise RAG System
hero.subtitle: Secure AI-Powered Document Intelligence & Knowledge Management

overview.title: System Overview
overview.document_intelligence_desc: Advanced AI-powered document processing supporting PDF, DOCX, TXT, and MD formats with OCR capabilities.
overview.knowledge_management_desc: Advanced search and retrieval system for enterprise knowledge bases with intelligent content discovery.
overview.multilingual_desc: Built-in multilingual capabilities with advanced translation and cross-language processing.
overview.enterprise_security_desc: Multi-layered security with RLS, threat detection, banking-grade encryption, and comprehensive compliance.

document_processing_items.multi_format: Multi-format document support (PDF, DOCX, TXT, MD)

banking_solutions_items.compliance: Basel III, MiFID II, FATCA compliance

deployment.offline_package_desc: Complete self-contained deployment solution with all dependencies included.
deployment.cloud_deployment_desc: Scalable cloud deployment with external processing capabilities.

integration.title: Integration & API
integration.api_capabilities_desc: The system provides comprehensive API endpoints for seamless integration with existing enterprise systems.

api_categories.auth_desc: Secure user management and access control
api_categories.documents_desc: Upload, process, and manage document collections
api_categories.ai_desc: Intelligent document analysis and response generation

methods.restful_desc: Standard HTTP-based API for system integration

authentication.subtitle: Secure authentication mechanisms to protect access to your RaghimAI Enterprise system.

authorization.title: Authorization
authorization.subtitle: Role-based access control and permission management.

encryption.title: Data Encryption
encryption.subtitle: Comprehensive encryption for data protection at rest and in transit.

network.subtitle: Network-level security controls and protection mechanisms.

ip_controls.whitelist: IP Whitelisting: Restrict access to specific IP ranges

audit.subtitle: Comprehensive logging and monitoring for security compliance.

architecture.subtitle: Multi-layered security approach ensuring comprehensive protection.

overview.title: Security Layer Overview
overview.external: External Access Layer: Network security, DDoS protection, and access controls
overview.auth: Authentication & Authorization: Multi-factor authentication, RBAC, and RLS
overview.app: Application Security: Threat detection, encryption, and PII protection
overview.data: Data Protection: Encryption at rest, audit logging, and compliance
overview.compliance: Compliance Standards: Regulatory compliance and industry standards

advanced.title: Advanced Security Features
advanced.subtitle: Enterprise-grade security capabilities for regulated industries.

compliance.title: Compliance & Standards
compliance.subtitle: Comprehensive compliance framework for regulated industries.

features.gdpr: Data anonymization, consent management, right to be forgotten
features.ccpa: Consumer data rights, opt-out mechanisms, data transparency
features.hipaa: Healthcare data encryption, access controls, audit trails
features.sox: Financial reporting controls, audit logging, data integrity
features.pci: Payment data protection, network security, monitoring

banking_financial.title: Banking & Financial Compliance
banking_financial.basel: Basel III: Risk management and capital adequacy
banking_financial.mifid: MiFID II: Financial instruments and market transparency

pii.title: PII Detection & Handling
pii.block:
# Automated PII detection
- Credit card numbers
- Social security numbers
- Bank account numbers
- Email addresses
- Phone numbers
- Names and addresses

# Handling mechanisms
- Automatic anonymization
- Encryption at rest
- Access logging
- Consent tracking

retention.title: Data Retention & Governance
retention.block:
# Configurable retention policies
- User data: 7 years (configurable)
- Audit logs: 3 years (regulatory minimum)
- Document data: Per organization policy
- Temporary files: 30 days
- PII data: Per consent agreement
- Banking data: Per regulatory requirements

testing.title: Security Testing & Certifications
testing.subtitle: Comprehensive security validation and testing procedures.
